title: Arizona Sues U.S. to Block Clawback of Funds Over School Mask-Wearing Policies
sub_head: Treasury Department said it could move to recoup pandemic funds if state didn’t redesign the programs
body:
Arizona sued the Biden administration on Friday seeking to prevent the Treasury Department from recouping federal pandemic aid from the state over policies related to mask-wearing in schools.
The state, in a lawsuit filed in federal district court in Phoenix, said that the Treasury Department exceeded its legal authority by establishing final rules governing the aid program—known as State and Local Fiscal Recovery Funds—that include health-related stipulations.
